title: Huge update of v2.6.0
content:
Feature:
- BIG: Tile mode

Enhancements:
- Sticky layer name column
- Removed a short delay of brush/eraser initial input
- Enhanced the "smoothness" of pressure sensitivity
- Bumped the canvas limit up a little (from 500-2500 to 800-3000)
- Added an option to make indices start from 0 instead of 1

Fixes:
- Some images have the wrong orientation when imported
- A rare crash with the curve tool
- Contour brush not working on the vertical edges of the canvas
- Alpha lock not working with mask layers
- Importing images from Files overwrites the existing px file with the same name
